first.title: Know exactly how much the construction will cost
first.text: Accounting for materials, tools and working time at a construction site

welcome.title: Consistency and control
welcome.text: At any time and in any place, monitor the process of construction or repair using a laptop or mobile phone

welcome2.title: Simple accounting system for construction and repair
welcome2.text: The Construction Assistant helps keep records in warehouses and at facilities. Veti statistics on construction sites, materials and work

furniture.text:
The accessories module allows you to create new names of goods and materials for your construction site. Coordinate them with all parts of the process.
You can invite architects, clients and other responsible persons to the construction site.

counter.users: Users of three countries trust us!

orders.title: Orders and warehouse
orders.text:
The “Orders and Warehouse” module allows responsible employees to order construction materials directly from the mobile application.
3 finger clicks and materials are already ordered!
The courier from the store or your employee can carry out the delivery of the ordered materials, and the manager can track these movements.

documents.title: Documents
documents.text:
All documents, estimates, checks and plans are always at hand using the “Documents” module.
You can always save the document you need and share it with a client, architect or construction company.

download.text: Download our mobile application, it is more convenient to administer projects with it.

lp.getRegister: Please fill in your email and password and get access to the program for free!
lp.registerRedirect: Thank you, you will now be redirected to the mail confirmation page.

verify.title1: We are glad that you are with us!
verify.title2: Check if the mail is correct? If you made a mistake during registration, correct the mail below.
verify.text1: A verification code was sent to you by mail
verify.text2: Please copy the verification code and paste it into the field below.

free.subTitle: Free rate
free.ability1: The ability to create and conduct 1 construction
free.ability3: The ability to invite users to the construction site
free.ability4: The ability to create a warehouse
free.ability5: Ability to create more than one warehouse
free.ability6: Ability to create more than one construction site
free.ability7: Ability to create more than two hundred stock items in stock
free.ability8: Ability to create more than two hundred items for approval

optimal.subTitle: Optimal rate
optimal.ability1: Ability to create and conduct 3 construction projects simultaneously
optimal.ability2: The ability to invite users to the construction site
optimal.ability5: Ability to create up to 3 warehouses
optimal.ability6: Ability to create more than three buildings
optimal.ability7: Ability to create more than three warehouses

premium.subTitle: Premium rate
premium.ability1: Ability to create and conduct 10 construction projects simultaneously
premium.ability2: The ability to invite users to the construction site
premium.ability6: Ability to create more than ten buildings
premium.ability7: Ability to create more than ten warehouses

storage.projectToStorage: From construction site "{name}" to the warehouse
